nodes.id: 中华民国陆军军官学校

zh-cn: 中华民国陆军军官学校
中国国民党陆军军官学校
国民革命军黄埔军官学校

location.zh-cn: 中华民国高雄市凤山区
location.en: Fengshan District, Kaohsiung, Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的国家直属军事院校，旨在培养中华民国陆军军官。1924年创校于广州黄埔，故又称黄埔军校。历经南京、成都时期，1950年在台湾凤山复校至今。
description.en: The national military academy of the Republic of China for training army officers. Founded in 1924 in Whampoa, Guangzhou, it is also known as the Whampoa Military Academy. After moving to Nanjing and Chengdu, it was re-established in Fengshan, Taiwan, in 1950.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国父，指示筹办中华民国陆军军官学校，并在开学典礼上颁布训词。
description.en: Founding Father of the Republic of China, who directed the establishment of the R.O.C. Military Academy and delivered the school motto at its opening ceremony.

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党总裁、中华民国军事及政治领导人，担任中华民国陆军军官学校首任校长。
description.en: Leader of the Kuomintang, military and political leader of the Republic of China, and the first Commandant of the R.O.C. Military Academy.

description.zh-cn: 创建中华民国陆军军官学校的政党，该校在创立初期为其党校。
description.en: The political party that founded the R.O.C. Military Academy, which initially served as its party school.

description.zh-cn: 支持并协助中华民国陆军军官学校成立的国家。
description.en: The state that supported and assisted in the establishment of the R.O.C. Military Academy.

description.zh-cn: 早期支持中华民国陆军军官学校成立的政党，许多中华人民共和国的开国元勋与将领均出自该校。
description.en: A political party that supported the establishment of the R.O.C. Military Academy in its early days. Many founding figures and generals of the People's Republic of China were its alumni.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军军官学校所属的国家。
description.en: The country to which the R.O.C. Military Academy belongs.

en: Ministry of National Defense (Republic of China)

description.zh-cn: 中华民国主管国防事务的部门，陆军官校隶属于此。
description.en: The department responsible for defense affairs in the Republic of China, to which the R.O.C. Military Academy is subordinate.

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党革命家，曾任黄埔军校的中国国民党党代表。
description.en: A Kuomintang revolutionary who served as the KMT Party Representative at the Whampoa Military Academy.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军一级上将，曾任黄埔军校总教官。
description.en: A general of the Republic of China Army who served as the Chief Instructor at the Whampoa Military Academy.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党及中华人民共和国主要领导人之一，曾任黄埔军校政治部副主任。
description.en: One of the main leaders of the Chinese Communist Party and the People's Republic of China, who served as the Deputy Director of the Political Department at the Whampoa Military Academy.

description.zh-cn: 1925年至1948年间中华民国的中央政府。黄埔军校于1927年改隶于其下。
description.en: The central government of the Republic of China from 1925 to 1948. The Whampoa Military Academy became subordinate to it in 1927.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国与大日本帝国之间发生的战争，期间黄埔军校西迁至成都。
description.en: A war between the Republic of China and the Empire of Japan, during which the Whampoa Military Academy relocated to Chengdu.

en: Government of the Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 1948年行宪后中华民国的中央政府。1949年迁往台湾。
description.en: The central government of the Republic of China after the 1948 constitution. It relocated to Taiwan in 1949.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军二级上将，1947年在台湾凤山创办陆军军官学校第四军官训练班。
description.en: A general of the Republic of China Army who founded the Fourth Officer Training Corps of the R.O.C. Military Academy in Fengshan, Taiwan, in 1947.

zh-cn: 陆军军官学校第四军官训练班
陆军军官学校台湾训练班

description.zh-cn: 由孙立人于1947年在台湾创办的军官训练机构，为陆军官校在台复校的基础，其人员与设施于1951年并入陆官。
description.en: An officer training institution founded by Sun Li-jen in Taiwan in 1947, which formed the basis for the re-establishment of the R.O.C. Military Academy in Taiwan. Its personnel and facilities were merged into the academy in 1951.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军二级上将，黄埔一期毕业生，于1947年接替蒋中正担任陆军官校校长。
description.en: A general of the Republic of China Army, a graduate of the first class of Whampoa, who succeeded Chiang Kai-shek as Commandant of the R.O.C. Military Academy in 1947.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军二级上将，黄埔七期毕业生，1950年担任陆军官校在台复校后首任校长。
description.en: A general of the Republic of China Army, a graduate of the seventh class of Whampoa, who became the first Commandant after the R.O.C. Military Academy was re-established in Taiwan in 1950.

description.zh-cn: 原名林正义，陆军官校44期毕业生，1979年担任金门马山连连长时叛逃至中国大陆，后成为经济学家。
description.en: Originally named Lin Cheng-yi, a graduate of the 44th class of the R.O.C. Military Academy who defected to mainland China in 1979 while serving as a company commander in Kinmen, and later became an economist.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军二级上将，陆军官校专科班第1期毕业，是陆官专科班出身的最高阶将领。
description.en: A general of the Republic of China Army, a graduate of the 1st class of the junior college program at the R.O.C. Military Academy, and the highest-ranking general from the program.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国第16任总统，曾主持陆军官校成立100周年校庆。
description.en: The 16th President of the Republic of China, who presided over the 100th anniversary celebration of the R.O.C. Military Academy.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国第14、15任总统，曾主持陆军官校成立92周年校庆。
description.en: The 14th and 15th President of the Republic of China, who presided over the 92nd anniversary celebration of the R.O.C. Military Academy.

relationships.target: 中华民国陆军军官学校

description.zh-cn: 孙中山指示筹办中华民国陆军军官学校，并于1924年6月16日主持创校开幕典礼。
description.en: Sun Yat-sen directed the establishment of the R.O.C. Military Academy and presided over its opening ceremony on June 16, 1924.

relationships.target: 中华民国陆军军官学校

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党第一次全国代表大会决议开办军官学校，创立党军，陆军官校最初为中国国民党的党校。
description.en: The First National Congress of the Kuomintang resolved to establish a military academy and create a party army; the academy was initially the party school of the KMT.

relationships.target: 中华民国陆军军官学校

description.zh-cn: 在孙中山的邀请下，苏联派遣军事专家并提供援助，支持陆军官校的成立。
description.en: At Sun Yat-sen's invitation, the Soviet Union sent military experts and provided assistance to support the establishment of the military academy.

relationships.target: 中华民国陆军军官学校

description.zh-cn: 在第一次国共合作期间，中国共产党支持陆军官校成立，并有许多党员在该校任职或学习。
description.en: During the First United Front, the Chinese Communist Party supported the establishment of the military academy, and many of its members served as instructors or cadets there.

relationships.target: 中华民国陆军军官学校

description.zh-cn: 由孙中山任命为陆军官校首任校长，后于1947年卸任改任名誉校长。
description.en: Appointed by Sun Yat-sen as the first Commandant of the academy, he later resigned in 1947 to become Honorary Commandant.

relationships.target: 中华民国陆军军官学校

description.zh-cn: 由孙中山特派为驻陆军官校的中国国民党党代表。
description.en: Specially appointed by Sun Yat-sen as the KMT Party Representative stationed at the academy.

relationships.target: 中华民国陆军军官学校

description.zh-cn: 在陆军官校创校初期担任总教官。
description.en: Served as the Chief Instructor during the early days of the academy.

relationships.target: 中华民国陆军军官学校

position.en: Deputy Director of the Political Department

description.zh-cn: 在陆军官校创校初期担任政治部副主任。
description.en: Served as the Deputy Director of the Political Department during the early days of the academy.

relationships.source: 中华民国陆军军官学校
relationships.target: 中华民国国防部

description.zh-cn: 陆军官校目前隶属于中华民国国防部。
description.en: The R.O.C. Military Academy is currently subordinate to the Ministry of National Defense.

relationships.source: 中华民国陆军军官学校
relationships.target: 国民政府

description.zh-cn: 1927年，陆军官校迁往南京市，改为隶属国民政府。
description.en: In 1927, the military academy relocated to Nanjing and became subordinate to the Nationalist Government.

relationships.target: 中华民国陆军军官学校

description.zh-cn: 因中国抗日战争爆发，陆军官校为躲避战火由南京西迁至成都市。
description.en: Due to the outbreak of the Second Sino-Japanese War, the military academy relocated from Nanjing to Chengdu to evade the conflict.

relationships.target: 中华民国陆军军官学校

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政府于1949年迁往台湾后，推动陆军官校于1950年8月在高雄凤山复校。
description.en: After the Government of the Republic of China relocated to Taiwan in 1949, it pushed for the re-establishment of the military academy in Fengshan, Kaohsiung, in August 1950.

relationships.target: 第四军官训练班

description.zh-cn: 1947年孙立人奉命在台湾高雄凤山开设陆军军官学校第四军官训练班。
description.en: In 1947, Sun Li-jen was ordered to establish the Fourth Officer Training Corps of the R.O.C. Military Academy in Fengshan, Kaohsiung, Taiwan.

relationships.target: 中华民国陆军军官学校

description.zh-cn: 第四军官训练班的所有学员、教师及设施都被编进陆军官校的学员总队，其班址成为陆官在台复校的校址。
description.en: All cadets, instructors, and facilities of the Fourth Officer Training Corps were incorporated into the cadet corps of the R.O.C. Military Academy, and its site became the location for the academy's re-establishment in Taiwan.

relationships.target: 中华民国陆军军官学校

description.zh-cn: 接替蒋中正成为陆军官校校长。
description.en: Succeeded Chiang Kai-shek as the Commandant of the R.O.C. Military Academy.

relationships.target: 中华民国陆军军官学校

description.zh-cn: 担任陆军官校在台复校后的首任校长。
description.en: Served as the first Commandant after the R.O.C. Military Academy was re-established in Taiwan.

relationships.target: 中华民国陆军军官学校

description.zh-cn: 陆官第44期第二名毕业。
description.en: Graduated second in the 44th class of the R.O.C. Military Academy.

relationships.target: 中华民国

description.zh-cn: 时任金门马山连连长，泅水叛逃至中国大陆。
description.en: While serving as a company commander in Mashan, Kinmen, he defected to mainland China by swimming across the strait.

relationships.target: 中华民国陆军军官学校

description.zh-cn: 陆官专科班第1期毕业。
description.en: Graduated from the 1st class of the junior college program at the R.O.C. Military Academy.

relationships.target: 中华民国陆军军官学校

description.zh-cn: 以中华民国总统身份主持陆军官校成立100周年校庆。
description.en: As President of the Republic of China, presided over the 100th anniversary celebration of the R.O.C. Military Academy.

relationships.target: 中华民国陆军军官学校

description.zh-cn: 以中华民国总统身份主持陆军官校成立92周年校庆。
description.en: As President of the Republic of China, presided over the 92nd anniversary celebration of the R.O.C. Military Academy.
